title: Zypr
description:
Pioneer Corporation is a leading global manufacturer of consumer and business-use electronics 
products such as audio, video and car electronics. In January 2010, 
Pioneer announced the Zypr platform for the aggregation of Internet 
services using the code name PAIS. Zypr is a cloud based API that acts 
as a device portal to normalize the interface between the myriad of 
Internet services and connected devices.
